content: Late at night I like to think about \ the things that I want \ and what is life \ and who is real?
author: MISSIO

content: I wonder if your therapist knows \ everything about me
author: Fall Out Boy
source: The Last of the Real Ones

content: "Yes," Ms. Bubblegum said sympathetically. "Sounds like quite the existential crisis. Perhaps consider having it somewhere else."
author: TJ Kline
source: The House in the Cerulean Sea

content: We are stories, contained within the twenty complicated centimeters behind our eyes, lines drawn by traces left by the remingling together of things in the world, and oriented toward predicting events in the future, toward the direction of increasing entropy, in a rather particular corner of this immense, chaotic universe.
author: Carlo Rovellis

content: You're my favorite what if, \ you're the best I'll never know.
author: Fall Out Boy

content: If you could have it all \ why do you want me?
author: The Technicolors

content: What if God's not real and everything we are \ is just a moment here where we're only growing older \ What if god is real and everything I've done \ pushed me down this path where we're only growing colder
author: MISSIO

content: Oh my precious ember burning, \ my sweet glowing light
author: Cage the Elephant

content: I'm walking back now \ past all the fires \ trying to find out why I grabbed the lighter
author: The Unlikely Candidates

content: I know you remember \ how the leaves fell in November \ the cold wind of December \ and how we just fell apart
author: Foreign Air

content: Ain't no chariots of fire \ come to take me home \ I'm lost in the woods \ and I wander alone
author: Barns Courtney

content: Got half a lung and two left shoes \ A bulletproof vest \ and some breaking news \ and I'm a blue-collared criminal \ if I forget my rent is due
author: The Unlikely Candidates

content: Oh come with me \ I'll show you how to live for free
author: Barns Courtney

content: The road is long \ we carry on \ try to have fun in the meantime
author: Lana del Rey

content: Now we're torn, torn, torn apart \ there's nothing we can do \ just let me go \ we'll meet again soon
author: Of Monsters and Men

content: We'd rather die than live to rust on the ground
author: Pierce the Veil ft. Kellin Quinn

content: Nobody's gonna hold your hand \ and guide you through \ it's up for you to understand
author: Sleeping with Sirens

content: And I don't want the world to see me \ 'cause I don't think that they'd understand \ when everything's made to be broken \ I just want you to know who I am
author: The Goo Goo Dolls

content: There are many things that I would like to say to you \ but I don't know how
author: Oasis

content: 'Cause the love that you lost \ wasn't worth what it cost \ and in time you'll be glad it's gone
author: Linkin Park

content: I'm with you 'til the end of the line
author: Steve Rogers

content: Promise me a place \ in your house of memories
author: Panic! At The Disco

content: Such an incredible waste \ of energy, to work your ass \ off for sixty years, \ then shrivel up, die, \ and be nothing more \ than a memory-- if you're \ lucky enough to leave someone \ behind who will remember you. There must be more \ Don't you think?
author: Ellen Hopkins

content: I believe what doesn't kill you simply makes you... \ stranger
author: Joker

content: The Trisolarans who deemed the humans bugs seemed to have forgotten one fact: The bugs have never been truly defeated.
author: Cixin Liu

content: I said that people never change their lives, that in any case one life was as good as another and that I wasnâ€™t dissatisfied with mine here at all.
author: Albert Camus

content: - Why me? \  - That is a very Earthling question to ask, Mr. Pilgrim. Why you? Why us for that matter? Why anything? Because this moment simply is. Have you ever seen bugs trapped in amber? \ - Yes. \ - Well, here we are, Mr. Pilgrim, trapped in the amber of this moment. There is no why.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

content: I say never be complete. Stop being perfect. I say let's evolve, let the chips fall where they may.
author: Tyler Durden

content: Respect the fact \ that everything you hate \ Your thoughts, your words \ and everything you say \ Defines you \ Define you
author: Brick and Mortar

content: In this hell of a season \ give me more than a reason \ to be with you
author: The Black Keys

content: As we slow dance, I became your statue, frozen \ 'Times I wonder are we just a puff of smoke? Yeah \ Underneath this bed of ashes \ still withholding everything \ like we were never close
author: Cage the Elephant

content: I'm down \ I should be on top but I'm always underground \ Things are looking up but I'm making myself drown
author: MISSIO

content: Now would you pray before you twist the knife? \ Yeah, would you take my hand and take a life?
author: Des Rocs

content: Take a seat back in your clam shell \ If the ocean's not enough \ nor am I
author: Peach Pit

content: I wish we started in the rain \ so that when it was gray \ We'd think it was a fine and normal day
author: July

content: I get high to leave \ all these problems on the ground \ Then to my surprise \ they're right there when I come back down
author: grandson

content: Didn't I have a reason? \ Laying flat in the driveway \ All this madness pleading \ speaking in a slow drip
author: Lewis Del Mar

content: 'Cause it might've been something who's to say? \ Does it help to get lost in yesterday?
author: Tame Impala

content: If heaven's grief brings hell's rain \ Then I'd trade all of my tomorrows \ for just one yesterday
author: Fall Out Boy

content: We can't change the things we can't control \ It's summer somewhere \ So you shouldn't be so cold
author: Foster The People

content: Every day it gets a little easier... But you gotta do it every day. That's the hard part. But it does get easier.
author: Jogging Baboon

content: This is my own private domicile and I will not be harassed
author: Jesse Pinkman

content: In another life, I would have really liked just doing laundry and taxes with you
author: Waymond

content: Is it bright where you are \ Now the people changed? Does it make you happy, you're so strange?
source: The Beginning is the End is the Beginning
author: Smashing Pumpkins

content: Heartbreaks, the heavy world's upon your shoulders \ Will we burn or we just smolder? \ Somehow I know I'll find you there
author: Cage the Elephant

content: What planet are you on \ What constellation \ You're floating like a ghost \ Out here in the unknown
author: Barns Courtney

content: I'm thirsty \ I'm dying \ Upon my desert island \ Why won't you come save me? \ I'm drowning in your silence
author: Foreign Air
